Audit Reports
=============

Below is a list of audit reports for the City of Abernathy.

* [2004-2005 Financial Statement *(pdf, 1.91 MB)*](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/04-05-Fin-Statement.pdf "2004-2005 Financial Statement")
* [2005-2006 Financial Statement *(pdf, 1.33 MB)*](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/05-06-Fin-Statement.pdf "2005-2006 Financial Statement")
* [2006-2007 Financial Statement *(pdf, 4.31 MB)*](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/06-07-Fin-Statement.pdf "2006-2007 Financial Statement")
* [2007-2008 Financial Statement *(pdf, 1.78 MB)*](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/07-08-Fin-Statement.pdf "2007-2008 Financial Statement")
* [2008-2009 Financial Statement *(pdf, 1.81 MB)*](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/08-09-Fin-Statement.pdf "2008-2009 Financial Statement")
* [2009-2010 Financial Statement *(pdf, 660.36 KB)*](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/09-10-Fin-Statement.pdf "2009-2010 Financial Statement")
* [2010-2011 Financial Statement *(pdf, 633.48 KB)*](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/10-11-Fin-Statement.pdf "2010-2011 Financial Statement")
* [2011-2012 Financial Statement *(pdf, 680.89 KB)*](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/11-12-Fin-Statement.pdf "2011-2012 Financial Statement")
* [2012-2013 Financial Statement *(pdf, 316.65 KB)*](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/12-13-Fin-Statement.pdf "2012-2013 Financial Statement")
* [2013-2014 Financial Statement *(pdf, 373.21 KB)*](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/13-14-Fin-Statement.pdf "2013-2014 Financial Statement")
* [2014-2015 Financial Statement *(pdf, 778.09 KB)*](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/14-15-Fin-Statement.pdf "2014-2015 Financial Statement")
* [2015-2016 Financial Statement *(pdf, 761.71 KB)*](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/15-16-Fin-Statement.pdf "2015-2016 Financial Statement")
* [2016-2017 Financial Statement *(pdf, 1.25 MB)*](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/16-17-Fin-Statement.pdf "2016-2017 Financial Statement")
* [2017-2018 Financial Statement *(pdf, 1.11 MB)*](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/17-18-Fin-Statement.pdf "2017-2018 Financial Statement")
* [2018-2019 Financial Statement *(pdf, 1.11 MB)*](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/18-19-FIn-Statement.pdf "2018-2019 Financial Statement")
* [2019-2020 Financial Statement *(pdf, 1.11 MB)*](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/19-20-Fin-Statement.pdf "2019-2020 Financial Statement")
* [2020-2021 Financial Statement *(pdf, 1.11 MB)*](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/2020-2021-Financial-Statement-.pdf "2020-2021 Financial Statement")
* [2021-2022 Financial Statement *(pdf, 1.57 MB)*](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/2021-2022-Financial-Statement.pdf "2021-2022 Financial Statement")
* [2022-2023 Financial Statement *(pdf, 1.11 MB)*](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/2022-2023-Financial-Statement-.pdf "2022-2023 Financial Statement")

Comments are closed.

Hours:  
Monday – Thursday, 7:00 am – 5:00 pm  
Friday, 8:00 am – 12:00 noon
